name.ca: Super Drag per a Google Chrome
name.el: Super Drag για το Google Chrome
name.fil: Super Drag para sa Google Chrome
name.hi: Google Chrome के लिए सुपर ड्रैग
name.hu: Szuper húzza át a Google Chrome-ot
name.ja: Google Chromeのスーパードラッグ
name.th: Super Drag สำหรับ Google Chrome

short.ar: تمكن ميزة السحب السريع غوغل كروم من البحث بسهولة عن الروابط وفتحها باستخدام السحب والإفلات.
short.am: Super Drag Google Chrome በመጎተት እና በመጣል ብቻ አገናኞችን ለመፈለግ እና ለመክፈት ያስችለዋል.
short.bg: Super Drag позволява на Google Chrome лесно да търси и отваря връзки само с drag & drop.
short.bn: সুপার টেনে Google Chrome সহজেই ড্র্যাগ এবং ড্রপ ব্যবহার করে লিঙ্কগুলি অনুসন্ধান এবং খোলা করে তোলে।
short.ca: Super Drag permet a Google Chrome cercar i obrir enllaços senzillament amb només arrossegar i deixar anar.
short.cs: Funkce Super Drag umožňuje aplikaci Google Chrome snadno vyhledávat a otevírat odkazy pomocí drag & drop.
short.da: Super Drag gør det muligt for Google Chrome nemt at søge og åbne links ved hjælp af træk og slip.
short.de: Super Drag ermöglicht Google Chrome das einfache Suchen und Öffnen von Links per Drag & Drop.
short.el: Το Super Drag επιτρέπει στο Google Chrome να αναζητά εύκολα και να ανοίγει συνδέσμους χρησιμοποιώντας drag & drop.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Super Drag enables Google Chrome to easily search and open links just using drag & drop.
short.es,es_419: Super Drag permite que Google Chrome busque y abra enlaces fácilmente usando solo arrastrar y soltar.
short.et: Super Drag võimaldab Google Chrome'il lingid hõlpsalt otsida ja avada lihtsalt lohistamise abil.
short.fa: سوپر کشیدن Google Chrome را قادر می سازد به راحتی با استفاده از کشیدن و رها کردن لینک ها را جستجو و باز کنید.
short.fi: Super Drag avulla Google Chrome voi helposti etsiä ja avata linkkejä vain vetämällä ja pudottamalla.
short.fil: Ang Super Drag ay nagbibigay-daan sa Google Chrome na madaling maghanap at magbukas ng mga link gamit ang drag & drop.
short.fr: Super Drag permet à Google Chrome de rechercher facilement et d'ouvrir des liens en utilisant le glisser-déposer.
short.gu: સુપર ડ્રેગ Google Chrome ને સરળતાથી ડ્રેગ અને ડ્રોપનો ઉપયોગ કરીને લિંક્સ શોધવા અને ખોલવા માટે સક્ષમ કરે છે.
short.he: Super Drag מאפשר ל- Google Chrome לחפש בקלות ולפתוח קישורים רק באמצעות גרירה ושחרור.
short.hi: सुपर ड्रैग Google Chrome को आसानी से ड्रैग एंड ड्रॉप के उपयोग से लिंक खोजने और खोलने के लिए सक्षम बनाता है।
short.hr: Super Drag omogućuje Google Chromeu jednostavno pretraživanje i otvaranje veza samo pomoću povuci i ispusti.
short.hu: A Super Drag lehetővé teszi a Google Chrome számára, hogy egyszerűen keressen és nyisson meg linkeket a drag & drop használatával.
short.id: Super Drag memungkinkan Google Chrome untuk dengan mudah mencari dan membuka link hanya dengan menggunakan drag & drop.
short.it: Super Drag consente a Google Chrome di cercare e aprire facilmente i collegamenti utilizzando semplicemente il trascinamento.
short.ja: スーパードラッグを使用すると、Google Chromeはドラッグ＆ドロップだけで簡単にリンクを検索して開くことができます。
short.kn: ಡ್ರ್ಯಾಗ್ ಮತ್ತು ಡ್ರಾಪ್ ಬಳಸಿ ಲಿಂಕ್ಗಳನ್ನು ಸುಲಭವಾಗಿ ಹುಡುಕಲು ಮತ್ತು ತೆರೆಯಲು ಸೂಪರ್ ಡ್ರ್ಯಾಗ್ Google Chrome ಅನ್ನು ಸಕ್ರಿಯಗೊಳಿಸುತ್ತದೆ.
short.ko: 슈퍼 드래그를 사용하면 Google 크롬에서 드래그 앤 드롭만으로 쉽게 링크를 검색하고 열 수 있습니다.
short.lt: "Super Drag" leidžia "Google Chrome" lengvai ieškoti ir atidaryti nuorodas naudodamiesi vilkimo ir perkėlimo funkcija.
short.lv: Super Drag ļauj Google Chrome viegli meklēt un atvērt saites, vienkārši izmantojot drag & drop.
short.ml: സൂപ്പർ ഡ്രാഗ് വലിച്ചിട്ടുകൊണ്ട് ഡ്രോപ്പ് ഉപയോഗിച്ച് എളുപ്പത്തിൽ തിരയാനും തുറക്കാനും Google Chrome നെ പ്രാപ്തമാക്കുന്നു.
short.mr: सुपर ड्रॅग Google ड्रॅगला फक्त ड्रॅग आणि ड्रॉप वापरुन दुवे शोधणे आणि उघडण्यास सक्षम करते.
short.ms: Super Drag membolehkan Google Chrome mudah mencari dan membuka pautan hanya menggunakan drag & drop.
short.nl: Met Super Drag kan Google Chrome eenvoudig zoeken en openen met behulp van slepen & neerzetten.
short.no: Super Drag gjør det mulig for Google Chrome å søke og åpne lenker bare ved å dra og slipp.
short.pl: Funkcja Super Drag umożliwia Google Chrome łatwe wyszukiwanie i otwieranie linków za pomocą techniki przeciągnij i upuść.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: O Super Drag permite que o Google Chrome facilmente procure e abra links usando apenas arrasto e soltar.
short.ro: Super Drag permite Google Chrome să caute și să deschidă cu ușurință linkuri folosind drag & drop.
short.ru: Super Drag позволяет Google Chrome легко искать и открывать ссылки, используя drag & drop.
short.sk: Funkcia Super Drag umožňuje prehliadaču Google Chrome ľahko vyhľadávať a otvárať odkazy len pomocou drag & drop.
short.sl: Super Drag omogoča Google Chrome preprosto iskanje in odpiranje povezav samo z uporabo povleci in spusti.
short.sr: Супер Драг омогућава Гоогле Цхроме да једноставно претражује и отвори везе помоћу превлачења и испуштања.
short.sv: Super Drag gör att Google Chrome enkelt kan söka och öppna länkar bara med dra och släpp.
short.sw: Drag kubwa inaruhusu Google Chrome kutafuta urahisi na viungo kufungua tu kutumia drag & tone.
short.ta: சூப்பர் இழுவை இழுத்துவிடும் பயன்படுத்தி எளிதாக தேட மற்றும் திறக்க Google Chrome செயல்படுத்துகிறது.
short.te: సూపర్ డ్రాగ్ డ్రాగ్ & డ్రాప్ ఉపయోగించి కేవలం లింకులు అన్వేషణ మరియు ఓపెన్ Google Chrome అనుమతిస్తుంది.
short.th: Super Drag ช่วยให้ Google Chrome สามารถค้นหาและเปิดลิงก์เพียงแค่ใช้ลากและวางเท่านั้น
short.tr: Süper Sürükle, Google Chrome'un sürükleyip bırakarak bağlantıları kolayca arayıp açmasına olanak tanır.
short.uk: Супер перетягування дозволяє Google Chrome легко шукати та відкривати посилання, просто використовуючи перетягування.
short.vi: Super Drag cho phép Google Chrome dễ dàng tìm kiếm và mở liên kết chỉ bằng cách kéo và thả.
short.zh_CN: “超级拖拽”功能可让Google Chrome轻松地使用拖放方式轻松搜索和打开链接。
short.zh_TW: “超級拖拽”功能可讓Google Chrome輕鬆地使用拖放方式輕鬆搜索和打開鏈接。

long.am,ar,bg,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,es,es_4:
Super Drag is an amazing extension for Chrome and Chromium-based browser users.

It's an extremely enhanced feature for Chrome.

With Super Drag, you can never be more easily open links or searches in one web page. Just hold on your left mouse button, performing a drag-n-drop, yeah, links open in the new tab.

With CTRL button holding on, drag-n-drop, your web page will be opened in an inactive state.

The drag-to-search feature is also useful and friendly to use. Selecting the key words, then drag-n-drop the selection, it'll search them by your customized search engine.

You can change the search engine by the extension popup settings.

It's the minimal and simplest Chrome extension ever.

Don't wait for any more, just try it right now.

If you like it, please make an review 5 star, thank you! :P
long.bn:
Super Drag is an amazing extension for Chrome and Chromium-based browser users.

It's an extremely enhanced feature for Chrome.

With Super Drag, you can never be more easily open links or searches in one web page. Just hold on your left mouse button, performing a drag-n-drop, yeah, links open in the new tab.

With SHIFT button holding on, drag-n-drop, your web page will be opened in an active state.

The drag-to-search feature is also useful and friendly to use. Selecting the key words, then drag-n-drop the selection, it'll search them by your customized search engine.

You can change the search engine by the extension popup settings.

It's the minimal and simplest Chrome extension ever.

Don't wait for any more, just try it right now.

If you like it, please make an review 5 star, thank you! :P

long.en,en_AU:
Super Drag is an amazing extension for Chrome and Chromium-based browser users.

It's an extremely enhanced feature for Chrome.

With Super Drag, you can never be more easily open links or searches in one web page. Just hold on your left mouse button, performing a drag-n-drop, yeah, links open in the new tab.

Default new tab opened in background tab, with SHIFT button holding on, drag-n-drop, your web page will be opened in an active state.

The drag-to-search feature is also useful and friendly to use. Selecting the key words, then drag-n-drop the selection, it'll search them by your customized search engine.

You can change the search engine by the extension popup settings.

It's the minimal and simplest Chrome extension ever.

Don't wait for any more, just try it right now.

If you like it, please make an review 5 star, thank you! :P

I create a Github project to track your requests and bugs: 
https://github.com/universeroc/super-drag/issues

You can give me a reward if you find it helpful:
https://github.com/universeroc/super-drag/blob/main/README.md

============== change log ======================
*0.9.9*
feat: support site search! https://github.com/universeroc/super-drag/issues/13

*0.9.8*
fix DOMInserted warning https://github.com/universeroc/super-drag/issues/9

*0.9.7*
support wikipedia search

*0.9.6*
fix Ctrl pressed to control open links in active failed, use shift instead. 

*0.9.5*
support bilibili search

*0.9.4*
support youtube search

*0.9.3*

add you.com

*0.9.2*
fix https://github.com/universeroc/super-drag/issues/7

*0.9.1*
fix https://github.com/universeroc/super-drag/issues/3
fix https://github.com/universeroc/super-drag/issues/4
fix https://github.com/universeroc/super-drag/issues/5
fix https://github.com/universeroc/super-drag/issues/6

* 0.8.2 *

Support drag direction recognition and using dedicated search engine to search keyword

* 0.4.2 *
update settings ui
fix some warnings
add installation & issues page to collect information

* 0.3.2 *
fix open more than one link/search page after 0.3.1 upgrade

* 0.3.1 *
fix drag file into page

* 0.2.2 *
add more search engines: sogou, 360, yahoo, ecosia, qwant, findx, amazon
new logo

* 0.1.31 *
fix dragging issue after dragging text

* 0.1.30 *
fix conflicts with Gmail or others input even handler

* 0.0.30 *
* Add DuckDuckGo in the search engine list
* Add domain whitelist

* 0.0.24 *
* Add toggle button to enable/disable on current page :)

* 0.0.23 *
* Fix bug: Multi-selection get undefined keyword :(.

* 0.0.22 *
* Fix bug: Not work until setting page opened :(.

* 0.0.21 *
* Support tab mode setting.

* 0.0.20 *
* Support Yandex.

* 0.0.19 *
* Fix link drag-n-drop.

* 0.0.18 *
* Fix undefined search queries with more lines selected.

* 0.0.17 *
* Fix bad tab index opened with multi-browser window

* 0.0.16 *
* Fix youtube playlist not work
long.zh_CN:
超级拖拽是非常酷炫的一个特性，适用于 Chrome 以及所有基于 Chromium 的浏览器。

超级拖拽是 Chrome 非常棒一个增强功能。

你一旦拥有了超级拖拽，你会发现打开网页上的链接或者搜索页面上的某些关键词，从未如此简单快捷。

使用超级拖拽的时候，默认在后台标签打开，如果你按下 SHIFT  按键，你的新链接或者新搜索页面将会在前台打开。

拖拽搜索功能非常有用并且易用，通过选中文本，执行拖拽选中文本搜索，就可以使用你设置搜索引擎搜索选中文字。

你可以通过插件的弹出设置页面，设置你想要的搜索引擎去搜索。

超级拖拽是功能极简的 Chrome 插件。

不要再等待，不要再犹豫，赶紧安装试用吧！

如果你发现这个小插件确实好用，不错的话，请给一个 5 星的好评呦，哈哈

我创建了 GitHub 项目来更好的跟踪特性和缺陷的反馈: 
https://github.com/universeroc/super-drag/issues

如果你觉得这个插件对你有帮助你可以通过这里给我打赏鼓励:
https://github.com/universeroc/super-drag/blob/main/README.md

============== 更新日志 ======================

support wikipedia search

support bilibili search

*0.9.4*
support youtube search

fix https://github.com/universeroc/super-drag/issues/7

fix https://github.com/universeroc/super-drag/issues/3

Support drag direction recognition and using dedicated search engine to search keyword

* 0.4.2 *
update settings ui
fix some warnings
add installation & issues page to collect information

fix open more than one link/search page after 0.3.1 upgrade

* 0.0.23 *

long.zh_TW:
超级拖拽是非常酷炫的一个特性，适用于 Chrome 以及所有基于 Chromium 的浏览器。

超级拖拽是 Chrome 非常棒一个增强功能。

你一旦拥有了超级拖拽，你会发现打开网页上的链接或者搜索页面上的某些关键词，从未如此简单快捷。

使用超级拖拽的时候，如果你按下 SHIFT  按键，你的新链接或者新搜索页面将会在前台打开，设置后台打开可以不影响你现在网页浏览。

拖拽搜索功能非常有用并且易用，通过选中文本，执行拖拽选中文本搜索，就可以使用你设置搜索引擎搜索选中文字。

你可以通过插件的弹出设置页面，设置你想要的搜索引擎去搜索。

超级拖拽是功能极简的 Chrome 插件。

不要再等待，不要再犹豫，赶紧安装试用吧！

如果你发现这个小插件确实好用，不错的话，请给一个 5 星的好评呦，哈哈

I create a Github project to track your requests and bugs: 
https://github.com/universeroc/super-drag/issues

You can give me a reward if you find it helpful:
https://github.com/universeroc/super-drag/blob/main/README.md
